name: .OGX File Extension
summary: Learn about .OGX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Multiplexed media file saved in the Ogg Vorbis container format; similar to an .OGG file, but can include multiple media streams encoded with different codecs; used for storing compressed audio and video data.

content: OGX files can be played using one of many DirectShow-based players for Windows. They may also be played with other media players that have a compatible Ogg Vorbis plugin installed.
NOTE: The OGX file format is designed to replace the previous OGG format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Windows Media Player with DirectShow filter
Apple QuickTime Player with XiphQT plugin
